short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Soul Eater wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Soul Eater background. Soul Eater wallpaper background theme for anime fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Automatically shuffle Soul Eater wallpapers with every new tab.
2. Choose a random Soul Eater background or save favorites via the wallpaper selection panel.
3. Integrated search bar powered by Google.
4. Quick access to emails and social media accounts.
5. Displays the current date and time.
6. Built-in notes section to jot down tasks and reminders.
7. Easy access to your most frequently visited websites.
8. Convenient access to your bookmarks.
9. Add websites to the shortcut panel for fast access.
10. Instant access to Google apps.
11. Quick access to More Themes.
12. Effortless social media sharing options.
13. One-click option to download wallpapers.
14. Quick links to play games.
15. Enable fun animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, or fireworks on your Soul Eater new tab.
